titles.title: American Heroes Repatriation Act of 2003

To provide, upon the request of a qualifying person, for the removal of the remains of any United States servicemember or other person interred in an American Battle Monuments Commission cemetery located in France or Belgium and for the transportation of such remains to a location in the United States for reinterment.
American Heroes Repatriation Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Benefits.

bill.summary: American Heroes Repatriation Act of 2003 - Directs the Secretary of Defense, upon application by a qualified person, to provide for: (1) the removal of the remains of any person interred in an American Battle Monuments Commission cemetery in France or Belgium; and (2) transportation of such remains to a location in the United States selected by the qualified person.
